original_text: Paul called one of the centurions and said, “Take this young man to the tribune, for he has something to tell him.”
korean_text: 바울이 한 백부장을 청하여 이르되 이 청년을 천부장에게로 인도하라 그에게 무슨 할 말이 있다 하니

sentences.original_text: Paul called one of the centurions
“Take this young man to the tribune
for he has something to tell him.”
